# analyzr

Provides functions, data, and vignettes to support the Data Analysis with R for the Wake Forest University Faculty Learning Community.

## Installation

You can install the released version of analyzr from [GitHub](https://github.com/WFU-TLC/analyzr) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("WFU-TLC/analyzr")
```
